column2: §YLuxuria:§! Racial Seeding
Determines if the Luxuria Fantasia races will be seeded into a new world.
None
The world will not be seeded with Luxuria Fantasia races.
Partial
There's a chance an independent ruler and their realm will be a fantasy race.
Luxuria Fantasia
Humans are just a distant memory now.
Seed Elves
If checked, elves will appear during seeding.
Seed Orcs
If checked, orcs will appear during seeding.
Seed Fairies
If checked, fae will appear during seeding.
Seed Nekos
If checked, nekos (cats) will appear during seeding.
Seed Kitsune
If checked, kitsune (foxes) will appear during seeding.
Seed Divines
If checked, divines (angels) will appear during seeding.
Seed Demons
If checked, demons will appear during seeding.
Seed Draconics
If checked, dragons and half-dragons will appear during seeding.
[House Irae] Seed Dark/Half Elves
If checked, some rulers will be set aside for House Irae's own racial generation. Required if using full seeding. Do not use this option if you don't play House Irae.
